data.name: OPUS: Echo of Starsong Original Soundtrack -Best Selection-
data.detailed_description:
OPUS: Echo of Starsong Original Soundtrack -Best Selection- features 32 beautifully mellow, bittersweet songs from the award winning franchise game.
All tracks written, performed, produced and mixed by Triodust

NOTE

All songs are available in MP3 and WAV format.
